profile.subtitle: Yonsei University, Applied Statistics & Computer Science
intro: Hello, I am Kim Dong Wook, a Full-Stack AI Engineer.
With a passion for data science, software development, and AI research,
I am pursuing my studies in Applied Statistics and Computer Science at Yonsei University.

details:
I am someone with a clear goal: 'Help children in need.'
In high school, I was unable to attend school for about a month, and my health was so poor that there was even a bed for me in the classroom.
As I wanted to help children with physical difficulties like myself through technology, I chose to major in Applied Statistics despite being from a humanities background.
Having started development late, I have studied harder, challenged myself in various activities, and given my best to each of them.

To become a good developer, I have experienced various positions including apps, web, frontend, backend, and DB.
To broaden my perspective on the world and repay the efforts of those who believed in me, I gained truly diverse experience while working at companies.
After collaborating with PMs and designers to create user-centered services, I realized the importance of "structural design."
Through the experience of building an AI learning environment from scratch as a project team leader, and
developing and training AI models from scratch tailored to that environment, I realized the importance of "fundamentals" underlying "application."

To find the fastest answer, I am someone who reviews from scratch.
I will continue to strive so that my efforts may reach those reading this.
Thank you.
